Swords https://swordscomic.com/comic/ Read Swords online! Comics https://swordscomic.com/media/SwordsLogo2020.png Swords https://swordscomic.com/comic/ <![CDATA[DXIII - Battlefruit]]> https://swordscomic.com/comic/DXIII/ https://swordscomic.com/comic/DXIII/ .tag { background-color: var(--tag-background-color); margin: 1px 2px; padding: 4px; padding-left: 24px; height: 16px; line-height: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; background-image: var(--default-tag-icon); background-size: 16px 16px; background-position: 4px 4px; background-repeat: no-repeat; }

Sea Captain: Draw your weapon!

The Captain pulls out his sword with a SHING! sound

Jolly Pirate: En garde!

The Jolly Pirate pulls out a banana with a WHIP! sound

Jolly Pirate: Whoops! Ha ha ha!

The Jolly Pirate peels the banana open with a PEEL! sound to reveal a sword blade inside

Jolly Pirate: En garde!

]]> Matthew Wills July 11, 2021, 12:03 p.m. <![CDATA[DXII - Walk the Dinosword]]> https://swordscomic.com/comic/DXII/ https://swordscomic.com/comic/DXII/ .tag { background-color: var(--tag-background-color); margin: 1px 2px; padding: 4px; padding-left: 24px; height: 16px; line-height: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; background-image: var(--default-tag-icon); background-size: 16px 16px; background-position: 4px 4px; background-repeat: no-repeat; }

bogg: It are a dinosword!

bogg: You must be most ferocious sword there is!

bogg: Now am strong enough to defeat big rock man!

The Big Rock Man is wielding his Big Rock

Big Rock Man: ARG!

The Dinosword hops out of Bogg's hands with a HOP! sound

dinosword: Sorry, I'm out.

]]> Matthew Wills July 8, 2021, 1:05 a.m. <![CDATA[DXI - Nothing to Fear]]> https://swordscomic.com/comic/DXI/ https://swordscomic.com/comic/DXI/ .tag { background-color: var(--tag-background-color); margin: 1px 2px; padding: 4px; padding-left: 24px; height: 16px; line-height: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; background-image: var(--default-tag-icon); background-size: 16px 16px; background-position: 4px 4px; background-repeat: no-repeat; }

Nervous Customer: I always get so nervoud when I'm hunting monsters. Can you help me?

shank the shopkeeper: I have just the thing: this "Sword of De-stress" should help calm your nerves!

Cave Monster: GRAARL!

Nervous Customer: I don't think it's working! I'm still pretty scared!

The customer holds up the sword to reveal that it actually says "Sword of Distress!"

Nervous Customer: OH NO!

]]> Matthew Wills July 3, 2021, 11:48 a.m. <![CDATA[DX - Swordwoman]]> https://swordscomic.com/comic/DX/ https://swordscomic.com/comic/DX/ .tag { background-color: var(--tag-background-color); margin: 1px 2px; padding: 4px; padding-left: 24px; height: 16px; line-height: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; background-image: var(--default-tag-icon); background-size: 16px 16px; background-position: 4px 4px; background-repeat: no-repeat; }

Swordwoman: Don't you know who I am?

Swordwoman: TRANSFORM!!

Swordwoman: SWORD PRINCESS POWER!!

The Swordswoman is now a Womansword : the Sword Princess

Sword Princess: That's right!! I'm the Sword Princess!

Sword Princess: Prepare to face justice, evil doer!

]]> Matthew Wills June 27, 2021, 11:54 a.m. <![CDATA[DIX - A Hard Job]]> https://swordscomic.com/comic/DIX/ https://swordscomic.com/comic/DIX/ .tag { background-color: var(--tag-background-color); margin: 1px 2px; padding: 4px; padding-left: 24px; height: 16px; line-height: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; background-image: var(--default-tag-icon); background-size: 16px 16px; background-position: 4px 4px; background-repeat: no-repeat; }

Monster Slayer: Are you the one seeking a monster slayer?

Client: That's right! There's a dragon that I want you to take down for me!

Client: There it is! The Ice Dragon's Cavern!

Client: Are you ready?

Client: Oh.

The Monster Slayers massive sword is now very short

Monster Slayer: I d-didn't know it would be this cold!

]]> Matthew Wills June 26, 2021, 1:02 p.m. <![CDATA[DVIII - Qwest for Knowledge]]> https://swordscomic.com/comic/DVIII/ https://swordscomic.com/comic/DVIII/ .tag { background-color: var(--tag-background-color); margin: 1px 2px; padding: 4px; padding-left: 24px; height: 16px; line-height: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; background-image: var(--default-tag-icon); background-size: 16px 16px; background-position: 4px 4px; background-repeat: no-repeat; }

hack: Normally humans can't do magic, but I have a shard from a magic sword in my shoulder, so...

Hack creates a magic flaming dagger with a FWOOM! sound

hack: I don't know much about your kind... Why don't you give it a try?

quest sprout: Hnnnghhhhh~!

Quest Sprout creates a magic sword woth a BOOP. sound

hack: Wow! Looks like you're just full of surprises!

]]> Matthew Wills June 14, 2021, 11:50 a.m. <![CDATA[DVII - Man of Slaughter]]> https://swordscomic.com/comic/DVII/ https://swordscomic.com/comic/DVII/ .tag { background-color: var(--tag-background-color); margin: 1px 2px; padding: 4px; padding-left: 24px; height: 16px; line-height: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; background-image: var(--default-tag-icon); background-size: 16px 16px; background-position: 4px 4px; background-repeat: no-repeat; }

Adventurous Sword: I'm here to buy a Swordsman!

There are assorted armored men standing on display

Sword Who Sells Swordsman By The Sea Shore: Sure, we got all kinds! The Iron Man... The Hue Man...

Adventurous Sword: How about this one?

There is an armored man covered in spikes and blood

Sword Who Sells Swordsman By The Sea Shore: Oh, the Woe Man! Great Choice!

The Adventurous Sword is carrying the Woe Man over his shoulder away from the store

Woe Man: Thanks for picking me.

Adventurous Sword: No problem!

]]> Matthew Wills June 12, 2021, 11:50 a.m. <![CDATA[DVI - Trainee Wheels]]> https://swordscomic.com/comic/DVI/ https://swordscomic.com/comic/DVI/ .tag { background-color: var(--tag-background-color); margin: 1px 2px; padding: 4px; padding-left: 24px; height: 16px; line-height: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; background-image: var(--default-tag-icon); background-size: 16px 16px; background-position: 4px 4px; background-repeat: no-repeat; }

sword of dark majesty: I am the Sword of Dark Majesty! Welcome to my evil lair, you foolish heroes!

Hero: Who'se your friend?

sword of dark majesty: Huh?

sword of dark majesty: P-Pay no heed to the mediocre intern hiding under my evil, flying body!

Glen: Hi, fellas!

sword of dark majesty: Shut up, Glen!!

sword of dark majesty: Don't ruin this for me.

Glen: Sorry, boss.

]]> Matthew Wills June 5, 2021, 11:50 a.m. <![CDATA[DV - Mysterious Mysteries]]> https://swordscomic.com/comic/DV/ https://swordscomic.com/comic/DV/ .tag { background-color: var(--tag-background-color); margin: 1px 2px; padding: 4px; padding-left: 24px; height: 16px; line-height: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; background-image: var(--default-tag-icon); background-size: 16px 16px; background-position: 4px 4px; background-repeat: no-repeat; }

Mystery Sword! Every one is unique! What will be inside?

Brigand: I got a Dinosword!

Swashbuckler: I got a Screaming Sword!

mystery sword - screaming sword: AAAAH!

Disintegrating skeleton: Look guys! I got a Plutonium Swo-

]]> Matthew Wills May 29, 2021, 11:58 a.m. <![CDATA[DIV - The Hardiest of Allies]]> https://swordscomic.com/comic/DIV/ https://swordscomic.com/comic/DIV/ .tag { background-color: var(--tag-background-color); margin: 1px 2px; padding: 4px; padding-left: 24px; height: 16px; line-height: 16px; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; background-image: var(--default-tag-icon); background-size: 16px 16px; background-position: 4px 4px; background-repeat: no-repeat; }

An assembly of various Dwarves are addressing their allies, the Golden Dwarves

bronze dwarves: We, the Bronze Dwarves of the Burning Mountains, will lend you our swords in this upcoming battle.

silver seeker dwarves: Likewise, the Blades of the Silver Seeker Dwarves are at your disposal, dear friends.

carbon nanofiber dwarves: THE ADVANCED WEAPONRY OF THE CARBON NANOFIBER DWARVES WILL SURELY LEAD YOU TO VICTORY!

carbon nanofiber dwarves: ALL HAIL THE TECHNO-MONOLITH!

bronze dwarves: I freaking hate those guys.

silver seeker dwarves: I know, right? Super weird.

]]> Matthew Wills May 13, 2021, 11:50 a.m.
